medical_history.chief_complaint: Elevated resting creatine kinase levels and rapid exhaustion after intensive exercise in a 12-year-old girl.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with rapid exhaustion following intensive exercise and were accompanied by elevated resting creatine kinase levels of 700 U/l. The mother was found to be MH-susceptible two months later, lending suspicion to a hereditary condition.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Mother diagnosed as MH-susceptible; history of general anesthesias in family with no complications; both grandparents were MH-negative.
medical_history.family_history: Both grandparents showed normal responses in the muscle test and had history of general anesthesias without complications; family genetic screening confirmed related mutations to malignant hyperthermia.
